DOC.brief_summary: Myofascial pain syndrome ( MPS ) common clinical problem musculoskeletal pain various treatment modality introduce . If self-applicable physical modality medication use treatment MPS patient combine , may open new possibility effective practical self-care . The aim study compare therapeutic effect non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAID ) patch give monotherapy NSAID patch combination transcutaneous electric nerve stimulation , heat pad , topical capsaicin treatment patient MPS upper trapezius .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison NSAID Patch Given Monotherapy NSAID Patch Combination With Transcutaneous Electric Nerve Stimulation , Heating Pad , Topical Capsaicin Treatment Patients With Myofascial Pain Syndrome Upper Trapezius : A Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients 20 year age diagnosis myofascial pain syndrome upper trapezius . 2 . Visual analogue scale ( VAS , 0 = pain , 10 = worst pain ) great 1 . Pregnant breast feed woman , patient take opioids within seven day , patient severe disease ( heart disease , liver disease , etc ) might affect result study , patient participate another clinical study within 30 day .
